tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I had Mallet Finger injury and many experienced doctors wasted my time and money , until I met him and we decided to undergo surgery, recovery was good , no pain at all now , though natural movement is little restricted , I am glad it does all the work , I hope I had met him first , my situation could had been lot better
